document_data.name: Ironmaster's Hall
document_data.mainbody: '''Ironmaster's Hall''' was an impressive stone [[inn]] located in the city of [[Ordulin]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
document_data.Inhabitants: Named for its owner, a skilled [[dwarven]] stonemason, Ironmaster's Hall was a palatial building with excellent accommodations and moderate pricing.
